entry.title: New release for Postiz: Timezone / Time + Char Limit + Bottleneck Fixes + Bluesky fix
entry.content:
• You can now see the characters of all the socials on the global editing.
  • You can change the timezone/date format from the settings
  • Bluesky added replies to the main comment and not to replies when adding a thread.
  • Shortlinking regex was not good with the new html tiptap editor Full Changelog: https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/compare/v2.4.2...v2.5.0
